# Installation

## Prerequisites
The DYNAMO-GRASP project has been tested on Ubuntu 20.04 with Python 3.8 and CUDA 11.8.0.

## Clone the repository
[GitHub repository link](https://github.com/dynamo-grasp/dynamo-grasp) <br/>
Clone the repository using the following command:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/dynamo-grasp/dynamo-grasp
```

## Conda Environment Setup
Create a conda environment with Python version 3.8

```bash
conda create -n myenv python=3.8
conda activate myenv
```

## Pip installation
To initiate your journey with DYNAMO-GRASP, use pip for installation:

```bash
cd <PATH_TO_YOUR_WORKSPACE>/Dynamo-Grasp
pip install -e .
```
